Name: Banoffee Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: MUDDLE banana in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Thick and rich, one for after the cheese course.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Barrie 'Snood' Wilson, Zinc Bar & Grill, Edinburgh, Scotland.
